lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs responded to their most successful regular season in franchise history with the greatest turnover in Gregg Popovich's two decades with the team.

headline.print_headline: Duncan-Less Spurs Eager for Another Run at NBA Postseason
headline.main: Duncan-Less Spurs Eager for Another Run at NBA Postseason
